tool_description: Tracks parts inventory levels, availability, and procurement needs for scheduled maintenance work orders.

work_order_ids.description: Work order IDs to check parts availability for

check_alternative_parts.description: Whether to check for compatible alternative parts

include_supplier_info.description: Whether to include supplier and procurement details

error_messages: Work orders not found: One or more work_order_ids do not exist or lack parts specifications.
Inventory system unavailable: Cannot connect to parts inventory database.
Parts data incomplete: Some work orders have incomplete or invalid parts requirements.
usage: Provide work_order_ids to check parts availability. Optionally enable alternative parts checking and supplier information. Returns inventory status and procurement needs.

parts_availability_status.description: Overall parts availability status: available, partial, unavailable

available_parts.description: List of parts that are currently in stock

unavailable_parts.description: List of parts that need to be procured

estimated_procurement_time.description: Estimated days needed to procure unavailable parts

total_parts_cost.description: Total estimated cost for all required parts
